param.label: Fusion method
param.help: How to fuse the omics layers?

param.label: fine-tuning
param.help: Number of samples from the test dataset to use for fine-tuning the model. Set to 0 to disable fine-tuning.

param.label: Variance threshold
param.help: Variance threshold (as percentile) to drop low variance features. Set to 0 for no variance filtering.

param.label: Correlation threshold
param.help: Correlation threshold to drop highly redundant features. Set to 1 for no redundancy filtering.

param.label: Subsample
param.help: Downsample training set to randomly drawn N samples for training.

param.label: Features min
param.help: Minimum number of features to retain after feature selection.

param.label: Features top percentile
param.help: Top percentile features (among the features remaining after variance filtering and data cleanup) to retain after feature selection.

param.label: log transform
param.help: Whether to apply log-transformation to input data matrices.

param.label: Early stop patience
param.help: How many epochs to wait when no improvements in validation loss are observed. Set to -1 to disable early stopping.

param.label: Hyperparameter Iterations
param.help: Number of iterations for hyperparameter optimisation.

param.label: Hyperparameter patience
param.help: How many hyperparameter optimisation iterations to wait for when no improvements are observed. Set to 0 to disable early stopping.

param.label: Cross validation
param.help: If set, a 5-fold cross-validation training will be done. Otherwise, a single training on 80 percent of the dataset is done.

param.label: Loss weighting
param.help: Whether to apply loss-balancing using uncertainty weights method.

param.label: Evaluate baseline performance
param.help: Enables modeling also with Random Forest + SVMs to see the performance of off-the-shelf tools on the same dataset.

param.label: Disable marker finding
param.help: f set, marker discovery after model training is disabled.
